__construct.name: __construct

check.name: check
check.summary: Checks whether the object has been constructed correctly or not.

parent.name: check
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

create.name: create
create.summary: Creates a new chat with the current user and another participant.

createGroup.name: createGroup

talk.name: talk
talk.summary: Sends a new message from the current user in the given chat.

info.name: info
info.summary: Gets information about the given chat.

getChatsHash.name: getChatsHash

setTitle.name: setTitle

addUser.name: addUser
addUser.summary: Adds the given user to the given chat (if the current user is admin of this chat).

removeUser.name: removeUser
removeUser.summary: Removes the given user to the given chat (if the current user is admin of this chat).

addAdmin.name: addAdmin

removeAdmin.name: removeAdmin

getParticipants.name: getParticipants
getParticipants.summary: Returns the participants of the given chat as an array of id_user.

getAdmins.name: getAdmins
getAdmins.summary: Returns the admins of the given chat as an array of id_user.

isParticipant.name: isParticipant
isParticipant.summary: Checks whether the given user is participant of the given chat.

isAdmin.name: isAdmin
isAdmin.summary: Checks whether the current user is an admin of the given chat or not.

isCreator.name: isCreator
isCreator.summary: Checks whether the current user is the creator of the given chat or not.

getChatByUsers.name: getChatByUsers

hasOldMessages.name: hasOldMessages

block.name: block
block.summary: Close a chat by setting blocked to 1.

leave.name: leave

getLastActivity.name: getLastActivity

setLastActivity.name: setLastActivity

setLastNotification.name: setLastNotification

getOnlineUsers.name: getOnlineUsers
getOnlineUsers.summary: Gets the list of online users

getUserStatus.name: getUserStatus
getUserStatus.summary: Gets the status of the current|given user

getMessages.name: getMessages
getMessages.description: Returns messages from the given chat sent after $last.

description_parts.content: Returns messages from the given chat sent after $last.

getOldMessages.name: getOldMessages
getOldMessages.description: Returns messages from the given chat for a specific day.

description_parts.content: Returns messages from the given chat for a specific day.

getActiveChats.name: getActiveChats

test.name: test
test.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

parent.name: test
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

log.name: log

parent.name: log

__call.name: __call

parent.name: __call
